meanings.sent1: The family had a planned picnic for Saturday.
meanings.sent2: The planned party went smoothly without any issues.
meanings.sent3: The planned surprise gift made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her planned route took her through breathtaking scenery.
meanings.sent5: The planned schedule kept everything organized and on track.

meanings.sent1: The planned outfit for the event looked stunning.
meanings.sent2: Their planned renovation transformed the old house beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The planned prank ended up being a hilarious success.
meanings.sent4: The planned garden layout created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: His planned speech captivated the audience's attention.

meanings.definition: To have a specific intention or purpose
meanings.sent1: She planned to visit her grandparents next weekend.
meanings.sent2: They planned to start their own business together.
meanings.sent3: He planned to surprise his friend with a homemade cake.
meanings.sent4: The team planned to win the championship this year.
meanings.sent5: I planned to learn a new language during the summer break.
